oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lebanese painters
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Development Studies Symposium, 15th National Conference on Development, "Violence in Education", sponsored by the Ministry of Education and Fine Arts and the United Nations United Nations Children's Fund (UNICEF). Place: Lecture Hall, Faculty of Medicine, American University of Beirut from 14-17 January 1992. Painting on poster reproduced by Madi.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Violence in education
